Title: Wild Things: Diamonds in the Rough
Writer: Andy Hurst, Ross Helford, Stephen Peters (characters)
Actors: Serah D'Laine, Brad Johnson, Michael Mantell, Sandra McCoy
Plot: Two young women will stop at nothing for one to gain a $4 million inheritance of two priceless diamonds, while two detectives try to thwart their plans, but find complications abound.
